attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need proper border controls to enable the immigration officials to know exactly at any one time who is and isn't in the country.

This should help in stopping undesirables entering the country and also make it harder for criminals to escape.

At the moment the police are chasing around the country looking for people who have been selected for deportation and they don't even know if they have already left on their own accord - how stupid is this.

Most other EU countries and many other countries have border controls to assist them and it is about time that we had the too.
